唐猫: (からねこ) - cat (esp. one imported from China)
唐獅子: (からじし) - (artistic portrait of a) lion
唐破風: (からはふ) - karahafu; type of cusped gable
唐突千万: (とうとつせんばん) - (yoji) very sudden; very abrupt
唐竹: (からたけ) - Chinese bamboo; bamboo imported from China (often used to make flutes)
唐糸: (からいと) - China-made thread or yarn
唐紙障子: (からかみしょうじ) - sliding door covered with thick patterned paper
唐縮緬: (とうちりめん) - mousseline de laine; mousseline; light woollen fabric
唐胡頽子: (トウグミ) - Elaeagnus multiflora var. hortensis (variety of goumi)
唐胡麻: (トウゴマ) - castor oil plant (Ricinus communis); castor oil bean
唐芥子: (トウガラシ) - capsicum (Capsicum annuum, esp. the cultivated chili peppers)/chili pepper (chile, chilli)/cayenne/red pepper; shichimi pepper
唐茱萸: (トウグミ) - Elaeagnus multiflora var. hortensis (variety of goumi)
唐草: (からくさ) - arabesque pattern; toothed medick (Medicago polymorpha)
唐菓子: (とうがし) - deep-fried Chinese pastry (sweetened with jiaogulan)
唐菓物: (からくだもの) - deep-fried Chinese pastry (sweetened with jiaogulan)
唐菜: (トウナ) - tang cai (Brassica rapa var. toona)
唐薑: (ゴシュユ) - Tetradium ruticarpum (species of deciduous trees)
唐行き: (からゆき) - Japanese women who worked as prostitutes in China, Manchuria, etc. (Meiji to early Showa)
唐行きさん: (からゆきさん) - Japanese women who worked as prostitutes in China, Manchuria, etc. (Meiji to early Showa)
唐行き様: (からゆきさん) - Japanese women who worked as prostitutes in China, Manchuria, etc. (Meiji to early Showa)
唐行様: (からゆきさん) - Japanese women who worked as prostitutes in China, Manchuria, etc. (Meiji to early Showa)
唐詩: (とうし) - poetry of the T'ang period; T'ang poetry
唐語: (からことば) - Chinese; Korean; foreign language; not-understood language
唐辛子: (tougarashi) - capsicum (Capsicum annuum, especialmente as pimentas cultivadas), chili pepper (chile, chilli), cayenne, red pepper
唐鋤: (からすき) - plow (esp. horse or ox-drawn); plough
唐鋤星: (からすきぼし) - Chinese "Three Stars" constellation (one of the 28 mansions)
唐門: (からもん) - karamon; large gate with a karahafu gable (typically at a temple, shrine or castle)
唐音: (とういん) - T'ang reading of Chinese characters
唐黍: (モロコシ) - sorghum (Sorghum bicolor); Indian millet
唖々: (ああ) - caw (cry of a crow, etc.)
唖唖: (ああ) - caw (cry of a crow, etc.)
唖蝉: (おしぜみ) - voiceless cicada (female); Asian cicada
唯々: (ii) - de boa vontade, prontamente, com aquiescência
唯々諾々: (いいだくだく) - (yoji)  quite willingly; readily; with acquiescence
唯々諾々として: (いいだくだくとして) - readily; willingly
唯そこへ行きさえすれば良い: (ただそこへいきさえすればよい) - have (need) only to go there
唯でさえ: (ただでさえ) - even at the best of times; already; (even) under normal circumstances; in addition to; as it is
唯一不二: (ゆいいつふじ) - (yoji) one and only; unique
唯一無二: (ゆいつむに) - (yoji) one and only; unique
唯一無比: (ゆいいつむひ) - (yoji) one and only; unique
唯今: (ただいま) - Here I am/I'm home!; presently/right away/right now/just now
唯唯: (いい) - quite willingly; readily; with acquiescence
唯唯諾諾: (いいだくだく) - (yoji)  quite willingly; readily; with acquiescence
唯唯諾諾として: (いいだくだくとして) - readily; willingly
唯心: (ゆいしん) - doctrine that all phenomena are produced from consciousness (a central teaching of the Avatamska sutra); spiritualism (in philosophy)
唯心論: (ゆいしんろん) - spiritualism; idealism; mentalism
唯我独尊: (ゆいがどくそん) - (yoji) self-conceit; self-centeredness; vainglory
唯物弁証法: (ゆいぶつべんしょうほう) - dialectical materialism
唯識: (ゆいしき) - vijnapti-matrata (theory that all existence is subjective and nothing exists outside of the mind)
唯識宗: (ゆいしきしゅう) - Hosso sect (of Buddhism)
唯識派: (ゆいしきは) - Consciousness-Only School (of Buddhism); Yogacara
唱う: (うたう) - to sing; (esp. 歌う, 詠う) to sing (one's praises in a poem, etc.)/to compose a poem/to recite a poem
唱える: (tonaeru) - recitar, entoar; chorar, gritar, berrar; advogar, promover, pregar, insistir
唱する: (しょうする) - to recite; to chant; to read aloud
唱名: (しょうみょう) - intoning the name of the Buddha; chanting the name of the Buddha
唱導: (しょうどう) - leading (movement, revolution, etc.)/guiding; instructing in Buddhism/converting (someone) to Buddhism; advocacy
唱歌集: (しょうかしゅう) - songbook; collection of songs
唱題: (しょうだい) - chanting the title of a sutra (esp. the Lotus Sutra)
